TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataReceivedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要以异步方式收集的重定向或流输出的过程中，您必须创建一个处理重定向的流输出事件的方法。To asynchronously collect the redirected or stream output of a process, you must create a method that handles the redirected stream output events. 当该过程将写入重定向流，被调用事件处理程序方法。The event-handler method is called when the process writes to the redirected stream. 事件委托调用事件处理程序中使用的实例。The event delegate calls your event handler with an instance of . 属性包含该过程已写入到重定向流的文本行。The property contains the text line that the process wrote to the redirected stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何执行异步读取的操作上的重定向串`sort`命令。The following code example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected stream of the `sort` command. `sort`命令是一个控制台应用程序的读取，并对文本输入进行排序。The `sort` command is a console application that reads and sorts text input. 该示例创建一个事件委托，它用于`SortOutputHandler`事件处理程序并将其与事件。The example creates an event delegate for the `SortOutputHandler` event handler and associates it with the event. 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行流，格式化文本，并在屏幕上写入的文本。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/sort_async.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/sort_async.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/sort_async.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As String
public: property System::String ^ Data { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取写入到重定向 输出流的字符行。

span.span: Gets the line of characters that was written to a redirected output stream.

value.span: 由关联的 写入到其重定向 或 流中的行。

span.span: The line that was written by an associated to its redirected or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将重定向或流到事件处理程序中，是每次引发事件的过程将行写入到重定向流。When you redirect the or stream of a to your event handler, an event is raised each time the process writes a line to the redirected stream. 属性是在行的写入重定向的输出流。The property is the line that the wrote to the redirected output stream. 事件处理程序可以使用属性来筛选进程输出或将输出写入到备用位置。Your event handler can use the property to filter process output or write output to an alternate location. 例如，你可能创建的事件处理程序将所有错误输出行都存储到指定的错误日志文件。For example, you might create an event handler that stores all error output lines into a designated error log file. 行的定义如下一系列字符后, 跟换行符 ("\n") 或一行后面紧跟一个回车换行符 ("\r\n")。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n") or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed ("\r\n"). 使用默认系统 ANSI 代码页进行编码的行字符。The line characters are encoded using the default system ANSI code page. 属性不包括终止回车或换行符。The property does not include the terminating carriage return or line feed. 重定向的流关闭时，null 行发送到事件处理程序。When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler. 确保你的事件处理程序检查之前正确地对其进行访问的属性。Ensure your event handler checks the property appropriately before accessing it. 例如，可以使用静态方法来验证事件处理程序中的属性。For example, you can use the static method to validate the property in your event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了与相关联的简单事件处理程序事件。The following code example illustrates a simple event handler associated with the event. 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行流，格式化文本，并在屏幕上写入的文本。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/datareceivedevent.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/datareceivedevent.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/datareceivedevent.vb#4)]
